images.caption: Figure 1:TheARTISTarchitecture.Agentic reasoning is achieved by interleaving text-based thinking, tool queries, and tool outputs, enabling dynamic coordination of reasoning, tool use, and environment interaction within a unified framework.

Figure 2:Overview of theARTISTmethodology.The framework illustrates how reasoning rollouts alternate between internal thinking, tool use, and environment interaction, with outcome-based rewards guiding learning. This enables the model to iteratively refine its reasoning and tool-use strategies through reinforcement learning.
